alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 23 at 6:34AM MST until February 23 at 4:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southern Hidalgo and northeastern Otero Counties in southern New Mexico. * WHEN...Until 4 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Lowlands of the Bootheel; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet; Uplands of the Bootheel
